summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CardioCoach persistent AI coach memory feature. All core functionality working including workout analysis navigation, auto-triggered deep analysis, conversation history persistence, and clear history functionality.
passed_tests: Backend: All 13 API tests passed (100% success rate)
Coach memory persistence tested - AI remembers previous conversations
Conversation messages stored in MongoDB with user_id, workout_id, timestamps
Workout detail page shows prominent 'ANALYZE' button in header
Coach page loads conversation history from API on mount
Auto-analysis triggers when arriving from workout (deep_analysis=true sent)
Deep analysis provides expert-level structured response (EXECUTION ASSESSMENT, PHYSIOLOGICAL SIGNALS, etc.)
Messages show 'Workout analyzed' badge when linked to workout
Clear history button works correctly - removes all messages from UI and backend
Memory persists across page navigations until manually cleared
AI responses are expert-level, actionable, and non-generic
Coach page suggestion buttons work correctly
Manual message input and submission works properly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (13/13 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all persistent memory features working)
